tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE neighborhoods (neighborhood_id INT PRIMARY KEY, neighborhood_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, population_count INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE streets (street_id INT PRIMARY KEY, street_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, neighborhood_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES neighborhoods(neighborhood_id));

CREATE TABLE buildings (building_id INT PRIMARY KEY, building_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, street_id INT NOT NULL, building_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (street_id) REFERENCES streets(street_id));
CREATE TABLE residents (resident_id INT PRIMARY KEY, resident_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, building_id INT NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id));

CREATE TABLE amenities (amenity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, amenity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, building_id INT NOT NULL, amenity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id));
